document.full_text: the former mets clubhouse manager charlie samuels, 53, was charged wednesday in connection with the theft of nearly $2.3 million in team equipment and memorabilia.
document.title: ex-mets employee charged in theft
lines_and_colors: the former mets clubhouse manager charlie samuels, 53, was charged wednesday in connection with the theft of nearly $2.3 million in team equipment and memorabilia.
